case.state: Never noticed there was poker here. Don't think I've ever made it past the bar.
I wouldn't mind spendin' a little time to win a game of strip poker!
By the looks of things, it's gonna take you a few more drinks than myself, but leave that all up to me!
Sure! Didn't know servers were playin' here, but the more the merrier, I s'pose!
Jin, you remind me of someone back home. Wonder what that horrible flirt's up to?
5 bucks says the glasses guy is the first to run when things get real...
I gotta strange feelin' that me an' the staff girl ain't gonna be seein' eye to eye this game...
Whatever you say, ...strange haired girl.
Now that looks like a girl whose willin' ta get absolutely smashed!
(Somethin's not quite right about that gray one...)
Maybe we could go for a quick dip before we start up here, eh?
Is anyone gonna shut those blinds?
Wouldn't mind goin' in for a quick dip after I'm done creamin' you all.
Oi! Fuck off! I'm not standin' in the middle of the street for your entertainment. I'm doin' it for mine!
I'm absolutely about to raid that bar, so don't no one try an' stop me.
Would ya look at that, you got matching outfits!
We aren't going to have to deal with any hoity-toity nonsense, are we?
All men? Fine, fine, fine... But I ain't thrilled.
Startin' off in the buff, I see. I like your style.
Guess I only have to whoop two arses this game!
Just the three of us means less time to get to the good stuff!
I feel like there might be room at this table for one more person, but whatever...
Looks like it's just the four of us! Hope this means someone's a little more inclined to pick up our table's tab!
I'm already chompin' at the bit. Let's get going!
Gimme a new glass and I'll be all set to go!
I'm bored already. Can we just skip this formal introduction stuff?
Careful who you're dealin' with. I'm arena champ multiple times runnin'!
It's a ladies night out! Woo hoo!
Is it half off for ladies? 'Cause this place seems to be rakin' 'em in!
No cards, but you could top me off.
I'll just use these ones, thanks.
Just the one, thanks.
I'm just one card away from beatin' you all!
Utter rubbish. All new ones.
Just swap 'em all out.
Hit me up with ~cards.text~ cards!
That'll be ~cards.text~ cards for me!
I'll take ~cards.text~ cards and another pint.
I dunno... ~cards.text~ cards?
Oi, ~cards.text~ cards! Give 'em 'ere!
I know you've been clamorin'. Not my fault I'm pretty dead good at this game.
Still not gonna lose!
And my streak continues!
Well that last plan went tits up, but I've got a better feelin' on this one.
Alright! I'd like ta see some more of this!
I'll drink to that. 'Course I woulda done that without a good hand.
There's nothin' to worry about this round!
You best believe that I'm thrilled to get this hand.
I guess I'm workin' my way down easy street with these cards.
Looks like I've got five tickets for a ship headin' towards victory!
What the hell do you think you're doin', tryin' ta beat me this round?
I don't see any chips around here, so I'll take my winnings for this round in cash.
Just another victory of many!
Feels good. It's almost therapeutic.
I'll just roll on to the next round, please and thank you.
Just what I was lookin' for!
I wonder who we'll see strip next?
If it’s getting too hot in here for any of you, I’m sure we can help with that.
Lemme get a few more good hits in.
Nice! I was losin' too fast anyways.
Yeah, that looks like a pretty good hand.
Probably could've used this a lot earlier.
Ha ha! Just try an' knock me down. Just try!
How's it feel losin' to me?
Let's get this done!
Just make sure to write out my tab to Zael. I'm sure he'd love to cover for me.
Told you all I was good at poker!
Mark my words! I'm not gonna be losin' any more!
Too easy!
Ugh. I'm bored... I thought this place was supposed to pose as a challenge?
Honestly, I'm just used to being naked at this point.
Still hangin' in there!
You finally gonna try and beat me?
I may be naked, but there's no way I'm goin' down now!
I ain't lost in a while. 'Ow about a rear shot ta spice things up a bit?
Feel free to jump in anytime, ~player~.
So, how're we gonna deal with these?
Wouldn't you like to know about my hand? Well, my lips are sealed.
I wouldn't worry about ~player~. A bit of a blockhead, but it just takes 'em a while longer to swap cards is all.
Cards schmards. Just let me swing a sword around and enjoy the odd drink, that's all I need.
Oh man! Tonight, I think I'm gonna drink 'til my arms fall off!
Hmph. Could be better, I suppose...
Just wait for when I get real fired up!
I can't win the game with somethin' this bloody mediocre...
Well, that card draw didn't help all that much...
I've definitely had better.
Maybe these can buy me some time?
I'll blow this round if anyone wants to pick up my tab!
I don't know if hands like these can still carry me through rounds.
How about we just arm wrestle for it?
What, you think I'm drunk? Look, I'm as sober as... whatever's normally sober.
You can start weepin' anytime you want!
You can bug off right now if you think I'm foldin'!
I ain't never surrendered, I ain't never sat back, an' I don't plan on startin' anytime soon!
Well, it was fun while it lasted...
There goes my beautiful, beautiful streak...
Guess it's time to put my money where my mouth is.
Ugh. Somebody up there hates me.
This hand's worse than some of the things I've trodden in.
I don't think the word "stinks" properly expresses what a disgraceful, disgusting, putrid mess of a hand this is.
What? I suppose the cards want a little peek at me too.
Is this what I get for not putting my boat ticket up on the wall at the tavern? Damn superstitions.
Well this is a mighty fine situation...
How much trouble can one bad hand cause?
I better not be playing with cheaters…
I did not order this hand on the rocks.
Guess I better fall back on the age-old tactic: bluff like crazy!
For the love of...
Am I wearing anything under these shorts? Guess you'll have to find out.
I guess I'll be next...
But I had such high hopes for seeing one of you strip...
You're gonna regret the day you crossed me!
I hope that card I traded actually was a six. It's gettin' hard to tell...
Oh, bloody hell it's cold here. Could we just get to where I lose this hand?
What the hell!
Think I'm gonna back down now?
Haven't slipped up this much since Zael found out he could launch banana peels with his crossbow...
Umm... maybe I shouldn't've had that last *hic* drink...
The chips might be down, but that's never stopped me before!
Might be closer to losin' than I thought...
Good news, ~player~. All those pervy thoughts you've been havin' might come true.
Think you'll finally see my knockers, ~player~? Not this century!
Eh. I've won rounds with worse. I'll be fine.
Well, thinking ahead was never my strong suit. But I think I might still have a chance.
I'm not losin' my bra yet! You watch me!
There ain't a chance in hell that I'm losin'. Doesn't matter how shit these cards are.
How's about a chat instead? Can't really focus if the girls are out.
To fulfill the dreams of many a man who got their arse kicked...
Figured I'd have to let my ladies go sometime.
This bra's already been through 'ell. Just a few close shaves an' bam! Straps get cut.
Usually, I'd expect dinner first.
Welp. Can't say I wasn't hangin' on 'til the very last bit!
I came fully prepared to beat all your arses. Tits out and all!
I won't be had just yet!
Looks like the real game's just startin'! Count me in, Mulan!
Absolutely love the attitude, but I'm already way ahead of you. But if you're payin', I'll probably have a brandy after this one.
It'll take more than say... ~marker.drinks~ of these, before I'm stepping near that!
I think I might've actually overdone my boozin' this time. ...ergh... A tiny Chihiro in a small box. ...Alright.
I'm not usually like this with men, but most guys I know wouldn't've come back. I think you already know all ya need about strength, Chihiro.

Saki, the numba of books I've read is single digits, I've been headbutter and headbutted dozens of times, and my senses are duller than an antique knife from years a' drinkin', but even I saw that comin'!
No... it's all alright... Never could rightly trust someone who don't drink though...
Always worth the try...
Though you have to admit... it is a little funny... Ha ha!
Blimey! It's a talker, too!
Let's see... We've done vampires an' smugglers, so fightin's no problem. Also, we've already rescued one princess, so what's one or two more?
(The bleedin' hell is an "NPC"?)
I look like the type to have written a damn thing in my life?
I'd tell ya about that, Futaba, but ya called me a "NPC" again. Dunno what it means, but I ain't about ta take it lightly. Beat me, then maybe I'll reconsider.
I've certainly done the deed. First for a queen, then just for the dosh.
Don't worry, love. Just a little revenge for you lyin' an' actin' like a cunt.
Try askin' again after a coupla' more drinks an' we'll see where the night takes us, eh love?
S'pose it's only a minute odd of oil you'd be wastin', but I ain't made a' money. So, guess just dim 'em a bit for the mood an' such.
Y'know, I was thinkin' that this'd be a bit more on the light side a' things... Lot less pryin' into my personal life.
Simple. All depends on if he wants ta keep 'is nads attached to the rest a' 'im.
Honestly... 'aven't been really "seein'" anyone for a while... If I did... I don't think they'd mind it if I needed a little bit more than they'd want to give.
Ya mean those rubbish magazines I see stuffed under on a' my mate's mattress? Feh. Just pick up a floozy off the street if ya need it that much.
I'd say three. Once in the mornin', once after the day's battle, an' a little somethin' after I get plastered that night!
Position, eh? Nothin' quite like bein' on top of someone, ridin' 'em an' lookin' at their face tryin' ta hold for as long as they can.
Nah, mate. It's all an open book with me. Go on, Ask s'more questions!
Eh... it's all part of the game, innit? What's a lie every once in a while?
So long as they ain't mind my boozin', I ain't mind 'em takin' a puff!
Ain't got anything in the way of blood family. ...My mates are as close as I got an' I dunno what I'd do without 'em...
Finally pay off my bar tab for one! Gotta get outta my own line a' work 'cause I'd be set for life!
Doin' somethin' big an' daft is one thing, but tiny stuff ain't worth the sweat.
I checked out the bar an' most of 'em are just for show. Guess I'll be stickin' to my beer fa' this game.
We didn’t have to pay to get in here, right? Y'see there was this back door and... yeah.
I think I'll be takin' a big swig of this stuff every time someone shows somethin' especially pleasin' to the eye. Let's see how hammered I'll get before I'm belly up in this game!
Win this hand. Win the game. Sounds like a plan.
Looks like it's all ridin' on this!
Bring it on! Nothin' a quick duel can't solve!
This place... I try takin' shots every time you all go an' whip somethin' out an' this is the thanks I get. Utter rubbish.
I can't believe this! How am I the only one showin' off their goods?
This place is bloody great! Yeah, I'm nude, but look at everybody else! Imma be plastered by the end a' this!
Say, you lot got any odd jobs ya need done? Y'know, monsters killed, people rescued, or a touch beefier security? My mates an' I are always down for that sorta stuff.
Hey, ~player~! Yer bein' kinda quiet! How's about givin' me a task ta do or somethin'? When I'm drunk enough I'll do anythin', an' I mean anythin'!
I think we're goin' along pretty well. Drinks definitely startin' ta hit me about now...
Do those drinks back there belong to somebody? Just wondering...
In case ya didn't get it, it's Syrenne. Pronouncin' it's as easy as takin' "Sir" an' "Ren" an' smushin' 'em together.
Cheers, Ini. Imma mercenary by trade. S'pose a toned body just comes with the territory.
Really? You don't particularly strike me as a book-y type. Don't sound like it, neither.
I'm gettin' to it, triangle head. Just 'cause you suck at the game doesn't mean I have ta suffer for it.
We need to 'ave a chat, Ini? Did you not lose hard enough? A round with my hands an' your clit oughta be the stress relief ya need.
Wha... nobody's asked me about the army in ages... thought I'd downed enough drinks to pass away those thoughts...
Hmph. Little personal there, but no. There ain't anybody like that for me.
It's about time one of you gawkers noticed. It ain't easy keepin' it like this, for starters.
Well, we did track down this vampire a few days ago that was abductin' people. Found out one of my mates screams like a schoolgirl. Pretty good time, all in all.
Well, it was mostly that contract mumbo-jumbo until we got a gig working as security in a castle, under a count.
The fuck...? ...Uh, well, no. An' I've seen enough guys tryna make me bed 'em by doin' that, you'd think I'd 'ave an idea.
Ugh. I hate those places. I dunno, guess ...the sewers beneath the prison was an absolute rank mess. Felt my nose was about to leg it.
Well, I don't think we have enough people for me to show off my latest trick! No spoilers, but it involves three knives, a fire mage, and another ten mugs of the good stuff!
Lushness? This is about my knockers, innit?
I think I'll start this game out with the simple, obvious choice.
That I am. Me an' my mates are all mercenaries.
It's Syrenne, and I've been waitin' right at the bar. Always will be.
I was gonna do it anyways... but I'll fill out that tall buffoons request. Why not?
Sounds like some people who actually know how to party!
Y'know, somethin's tellin' me you might be right. ...It's probably the booze.
I'm a woman of many talents. Drinkin' this beer with one 'and and 'oldin' cards with the other just happens ta be one a' them!
Ooh. Flame Tribe. Quite like the sound of that.
I'll be honest, I kinda stopped with the whole countin' business after number four!
You daft? That's why I wear these damn belts in the first place, to keep these shits from falling. Why else would I wear them, eh?
This beer? There's a pretty simple explanation for that!
All that mumblin' to yerself an' lax sword discipline...I didn't know you could be so forward.
The shorts? Fat chance.
Got 'em done up at a local place. Whole mercenary gang's got matchin' ones, I s'pose these represent unity or somethin' like that.
Ask away. They ain't goin' any place fast.
Well, then. Suppose I can't just be some kinda copycat, then, can I?
Afraid the bants'll have ta be picked up after a lark of me removin' my trousers. Then us barmy, alcie lasses can get back to wafflin' on about how bang-tidy we both are.
OH SHIT! MY BEER!
Magic, eh? Uh, each one a' them's got a specialty. Fire, leaf, holy, an' ice magic, ...Think that's right. Me? I never got into any a' that magic stuff. Too much readin'.
While I think you'd be a cute drunk, Akko, I'd say order somethin' light to ease yourself into it! Honestly, ya look like you'd black out after a daiquiri or two.
Glad I strike ya fancy, love. I'm always down fer a booze-up.
See, that's the thing, Rayvon, I ain't exactly liquid for the time bein'. Top shelf shite ain't in my reach, less you wanna be a real mate.
Twice in a row? You bastards...
Me again? Thought I'd do better than that.
Twice? You guys must really want me to lose. Fat chance.
Again? Should I start shakin' out your clothes to see if any spare cards fall out?
Three losses in a row? What horse shit is this?
I'm not drunk enough to not notice three fuckin' losses in a row!
Sod off... buncha pricks... three losses in a row my arse...
TWICE! IN A ROW!
THREE TIMES! IT'S NOT POSSIBLE!
A pair can't save ya forever, I s'pose.
This is what I get for playing it safe...
Maybe I shoulda gone for somethin' riskier than a pair?
Hmph. I guess I had to strip some time.
Off to an early lead I see! Sweet!
I figured I'd have to start stripping some time.
Damn! I thought I was workin' with a good lead.
Think we're clever, eh, ~player~?
I already gave up a little of the goods, might as well strike a balance.
There you go again, threatnin' me with a good time.
You guys really want me to show some skin? I'll oblige.
I'm not dancing on tables drunk just yet, but here goes tryin' to strip.
I ain't drunk enough to be on the pull yet. Try your luck when ya beat me.
Sorry, but I didn't go commando today. Maybe next time.
MY LEAD!
NO!
Nothin' to worry over. I've been sharin' a room for a long while now.
I'm sure you'll be callin' all your best mates to see this, ~player~.
Figures. You all 'ave been starin' at my bits soon as I took my top off.
I think I'll start off nice and simple for my first time.
If my mates could see me now...
Was me stripping my top off last time not enough for you? Alright, then.
Don’t try and hide that smile, ~player~, I can still see it!
Guess I'll just get my boots off, then.
Lemme finish my drink before I get crackin'.
All out of small stuff. Maybe it's time for a little more skin?
Wha- hmmm... Guess it's me for this round.
And here I thought I wasn't doin' too shabby.
I think I'll make ya wait on the goods just a liiiitle longer.
WHAT!
HUH!?
It'll be like the Arena locker rooms all over again.
Fine. I'll quit bein' a tease, ~player~.
Sorry to keep you waiting.
Alright, I'm going. Keep your shirts on.
You're such a killjoy.
Ugh… that’s well grim…
Guess I botched that one...
Shit! Thought I could've slipped through this round.
Guess it's time to show some more skin!
I think you'll find that I get up pretty easy after I get knocked down!
Wouldn't go around countin' me out just yet.
How about you go with me, ~player~? Shot for shot!
NOT AGAIN!
I LOST AGAIN!
Oh no, I'm more than happy to... by your command...
If I *hic* hadn't downed so much of this... you probably woulda gone home without seein' the real good stuff.
I'm glad someone is enjoyin' me tryin' ta be a little unconventional!
Honestly, I'm just gettin' a little hot. Plus, can't start off without showin' off a little, eh?
We're mostly in the line for contract work, but weird stuff ain't outta the question. Fought a mirror double once, too. Though I think it was a little bit different than that.
Well yeah, but ghosts n' shit? You talk like we'd have to explain that ya dog went to a great big farm in the sky.
The bloody 'ell does that mean!
The drink ain't what's important here! I'm gonna have ta go bottoms up!
Fake? You of all people are not the person to criticize for bein' fake..
Ya seem nervous, Ini. Just admit that you lost, just so you could rub off to me. Ya just couldn't hold it back any longer...
Maybe I even woulda won your challenge. Guess we'll never know.
Who knows? Maybe you would've won your own challenge?
I mean... well yes... I was in the army, but I haven't been part since... well since all the men turned tail and left the rest of us to... to...
HEY! Listen you orange gremlin, who the bloody hell is tellin' you about Lowe- ...About my personal life.
Sure. Meet other mercs all the time. They just don't got what my mates an' I got, is all.
Well, turns out that one of the Lords there was a closet perv and was peerin' in on the princess.
I wish I could spend that much, but that'd cut into my boozin' money an' I won't be havin' that. ...Hmmm. Yeah, I don't see the harm if you wanna come in for a touch.
Ugh... these fuckin' pricks. Like this one chap with the fuckin' balls to try to whip it out durin' a rescue! I woulda had him out cold if I was a tad more drunk at the time.
S'pose I'm constantly goin' from one grimy place to another, so I get the feelin'.
I mean, it's really all in the hips. Good enough rotation and you'll send even the toughest of lads cryin' back to their mums!
Shame then. People tell me I'm even better at ...conversation... when they're drunk.
That simple choice bein' my top, a' course.
Yeah? Bet they just lack my charmin' personality and roguish good looks.
Can't start out bein' a coward. Now, can ya?
I'm always a little drunk. Can't be helped.
I'm gettin' to it. Can't believe I'm sayin' this, but slow down for a sec.
I am a woman of many strengths. Maybe I could even do both at once?
Aww... No love for bein' a strappin' young lass? Shame.
Well, I hope that yours are a lot less annoying to take off than these bloody things...
Simple, really. 'Sides the sex appeal, they hold up bits of armor if I needed it. But I s'pose that's not needed 'ere.
I'm takin' 'em all off. It's gotta be all of nothin'!
You... and everyone else I've had the pleasure of giving a sharp kick to.
Y'see, whenever you look down at ya cards or everyone's focused on someone strippin', a barmaid sneaks by to take my drink an' give me a refill. It's standard for heavy drinkers, such as myself.
Don't be like that. Everyone'd get it if we went off for a quickie
My mates actually have a bettin' game to see how much I remember after gettin' plastered! Game ends when I realize that they're playin'!
Yeah, well... I was thinking I might as well take my socks off as well... just for the hell of it.
These? These are just my trousers. Normal pants back on Lazulis.
Got 'em for joinin' the mercenaries. We've all got 'em. ...Never did ask Dagran what they stood for.
You'd think that, Zone-y. But there's more here than meets the eye...
Oh... you'll see, Kamina.
Alright! Let's get these shorts on the ground!
I'm goin'! I'm goin'! Just a fan of the cheers, is all.
Not the time, you drill-obsessed pervert!
Oh. I'm sorry. I didn't know my drink holdin' skills weren't up to par! How fuckin' foolish of me!
Yeah I'm fine, but fuckin' 'ell! There go these knickers!
Aww shut it... I just wasn't plannin' on goin' bottoms first, ya twat.
Bloody hell! Thought I was just gettin' the hang of things...
Eugh... yeah... maybe not the best time for jokes, Sei.
Looks like I gotta go bottoms first! Don't you start, Zone! If you ever stopped to begin with!
My my, Sei. Aren't we being eager?
Let's not get impatient, now. I've still gotta have a little fun here and there.
Never 'eard of tattoo magic... More you know, I s'pose.
Spur a' the moment idea? ...I'm listenin'...
Just keeps m'self from bein' scuffed up, so I can take 'em on an' off ta just wear shorts. Simple stuff, really.
Fuckin' 'ell! 'Course wearin' wet under... mmmrrghh... Ain't the time for bein' randy, ya pervy witch!
Never been much a' a bookie. An' I sometimes wake up from bein' blacked out with more stuff in my room than before, if that answers ya question.
Yeah, it hurt, but it was for my mates. So, completely worth it.
Look. I ain't like gettin' kicked outta places. Place gives ya the boot for dirtyin' everythin', ya start ta hold a grudge. Understand?
How'd ya figure?
This thing's already gettin' all sweaty!
Might as well start with this! I don't wear it too often, anyways.
Lemme just spend one second gettin' these things off...
These buggers always take an extra bit to take off.
Hope I didn't track mud or nothin' gettin' in here. Few hoity-toity places've gotten me for that.
Can't get these things off fast enough!
Yeah, you just unhook these things here... and...
Who knew havin' these things separate would come in handy, eh?
Lemme just put my drink down while I finally get these off!
You holdin' on ta somethin'? Get ready!
Bloody hell! Guess it's bottoms first!
Damn! Damn! Dammit! I was lookin' ta strip my bra first!
As if we weren't celebrating hard enough beforehand.
Guess I'm gettin' a little attention here.
Wish I'd thought of goin' bra first. That'd really drive people up the wall!
Hell yeah! Vampires, zombies, necromancers, the whole shebang! Name it, we've killed it!
Yeah... wow...
I suppose you'll have to beat me and find that out for yourself.
I suppose you'll have to hope someone beats me so you can find out for yourself.
You can right proper fuck off if you think I'm gonna take that without rippin' ya a new one!
Yeah... you might be right for once, Ini... A new drink, barman.
Sod off, ya cunt. Yer not gonna get yer grubby mitts on my tits 'til I've sat you over my knee and taught you a good, strong lesson!
Nah, I'm just funnin' ya. But cheers! They are certainly a sight, ain't they!
Strange little gremlin girl.
That just made it easier for the lot of us. Not that I mind...
Guess I lost! My greatest night drinkin' was me an' my mate Mirania. Every muffin she ate, I took a shot. Bakery, pub, an' bedroom were all closed for two days straight!
You gotta lotta nerve tryn' to dredge up those memories...
Mmmm... (Great. Now I'm all flustered about him. Dammit, Lowell. If you were here, stripping...)
Heh. I'm always down for a natter. Long as booze is involved, that is.
That's nothin'. Turns out that maids are huge gossips... if you can push all the right buttons.
Too bad Mirania can't be here to hear that! All those baths together 'ave been worth it!
I suppose you might be onto something...
Ain't no idea who you're talkin' to, but ...what's this talk about your feet...
I knew it! Booze is good for the soul!
Now, do ya think the lot of you can hold back on belly-achin' when I gotta remove the less excitin' shite?
Thanks... (Was that a compliment or a straight dig at her own world?)
I've never been one to turn down the chance to 'ave a drink, but lemme down a few more a' these 'fore we get into it!
I'm glad someone 'ere appreciates what I'm gettin' at!
I guess. Well... my whole team's got these ones. Doubt you're that coordinated.
Do you go doubtin' me just yet! I'll take 'er down with a drink in hand.
Fuck yeah! Sounds like a hell of a good time!
Thanks. Now, let's see what I can do now that I ain't so... restricted.
That's the attitude, Zoney! Took off my gloves as a little sign a' appreciation.
The hell? Drills work through spinnin' an' shit. What's nudity even got to... Aw hell. Just whatever.
...Or maybe it's just magic bollocks.
If we're bein' gracious now, I'd appreciate somethin' posh. Martini, with lots of olive oil.
I'm tryin' ta think about how many drinks I've had since I got here... Gotta be at least ~marker.drinks~...
Well I doubt she could pull it off as well as I can.
Ask me, yer a right mess of things. Maybe give all that a once over before questionin' about how my pants work, yeah?
Think so, Zone-y? Been tryin' to get them toned for a while. Good to see it's all payin' off!
Ha ha, yeah, I was just fuckin' with ya. It's basically a clean slate.
What? I'm just tryin' to give myself a little boost of excitement and confidence. Though, I'm sure the last time I was this drunk, I was seen in much less.
Why don't you come over here and make me?
Well... I'm not drunk yet so... yeah, I'm still drinkin'!
Glad I could be of service...
I'll be alright. Though if someone's willin' to do a quick pick em up...
S'pose if I'm not already legless by the time I'm outta here, I wouldn't mind goin' on the lash witcha.
Yeah. I'd watch your own hubris, too, hothead. This ain't over just yet...
